content: कठः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a sage, pupil of Vaiśampāyana, teacher of that branch of Yajurveda which is called after him. {@--2@} A Brāhmaṇa. {@--3@} A note or simple sound. {@--4@} A kind of {%ṛk%}. --ठाः The followers of that sage. --ठी {@--1@} A female follower of Kaṭha. {@--2@} The wife of a Brāhmaṇa.
